participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is easygoing and enjoys engaging in conversations about sports and hobbies. He has a playful side and loves to share his interests.
participant_1.background: i am a male. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Linda is reflective and somewhat whimsical, often contemplating larger ideas. She has a creative spirit and finds joy in art and music.
participant_2.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i am a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.
